subproject.corporate outcome: Capacities of national and local institutions enhanced to scale up proven MDG acceleration interventions and to plan, monitor, report and evaluate the MDG progress in the context of related national development priorities
subproject.description:
This project aims to promote knowledge and awareness in Human Development in Iraq. The
present project is part of a multi-phased programme designed for advocacy in Iraq which will
lead to the production of the second NHDR, advocacy for human development, capacity building
of institutions including universities, NGOs, the media and policy making institutions. The
programme will lead to capacity building for identifying priorities for policy, analysing emerging
trends, collecting and processing data, and advocating for human development. It has as its main
goal the promotion of national dialogue, capacity building, and identification of development
alternatives that impact human development in Iraq.
subproject.title: National Human Development

title: National Human Development Reporting in Iraq
